channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- SAP_ABA
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- SAP_ABA

item.title: CVE-2018-2481|2024-08-05T04:21:34.036Z -- sap -- sap_aba
item.description: In some SAP standard roles, in SAP_ABA versions, 7.00 to 7.02, 7.10 to 7.11, 7.30, 7.31, 7.40, 7.50, 75C to 75D, a transaction code reserved for customer is used. By implementing such transaction code a malicious user may execute unauthorized transaction functionality.
